Ashley Young is proud of his position as Manchester United's dressing-room DJ, even if he admits the younger players can sometimes be unsure about his choice of music.

"If you ask the boys in the dressing room who should put the music on, I know my name will come up," said Young. "Some people have tried to take over and it’s just not worked. Paul [Pogba] has put his music on sometimes and David [De Gea] put something on... I don't know what that was!"

If the heavy metal favoured by De Gea doesn't have the desired effect, what is it on Young's playlist that proves so popular and ensures the DJ job remains his domain?

"Just a bit of house, funky house, hip-hop," he replied.

"Actually, I went old skool the other day, the 1990s and 2000s. It was old-skool house stuff and it went down well but a few people were looking around, wondering it was. That’s what happens now I’m a senior player. The youngsters are thinking, 'What is this?!"

重要係世界級右閘
英超下季開放波衫袖位廣告，等各球隊多番條財路，曼城之前就率先同南韓輪胎公司耐克森簽約，一年贊助費就有500萬鎊（約4,800萬港元）。雖然曼聯近年成績及唔上曼城，但以全球粉絲計，仍然遠超曼城，袖位廣告當然亦有價有市。據每日鏡報報導，唔少跨國企業已經吼住紅魔鬼呢個廣告位，估計贊助費達2,000萬鎊（約1.95億港元），係曼城嘅四倍。曼聯咁多財路，唔怪得今夏又話買基沙文，又話買尼馬啦。

We have to play Everton and Sunderland and these two matches are where we have to go for them. We’re thinking about the Premier League and nothing else. After the match against Sunderland, we have Anderlecht. The quarter-finals of the Europa League are very important for us."

Mourinho has hinted Zlatan Ibrahimovic may play against the Toffees on Tuesday night after completing his suspension but he admits there is no guarantee the United striker would have broken the duck against the Baggies.

"We had matches here with Zlatan where we drew," recalled the manager. "He missed a penalty in the game against Bournemouth and missed chances like other people did too.

"I cannot say now that if Zlatan and Juan Mata had played on Saturday, we would have won the game. I cannot say that at all. What I can say is Jones and Smalling wouldn’t play better than Bailly and Rojo did and Pogba and Herrera couldn’t play better than what Fellaini and Carrick did."

Paul Pogba was among a group of United players training on the Old Trafford pitch following the West Brom match but Mourinho could not confirm if the Frenchman would face Everton.

"I don’t know about Pogba," he said. "I think Mata is out for a long time, Jones and Smalling for a long time, but I cannot say on Pogba. I cannot say he is ready for Tuesday because I don’t know. I don’t think he is such a long-term injury like the others."

Mourinho has hinted Zlatan Ibrahimovic may play against the Toffees on Tuesday night after completing his suspension but he admits there is no guarantee the United striker would have broken the duck against the Baggies.

"We had matches here with Zlatan where we drew," recalled the manager. "He missed a penalty in the game against Bournemouth and missed chances like other people did too.

我覺得要大膽用青訓 再係咁真係收皮


照要放屎波 買新中堅

We have to play Everton and Sunderland and these two matches are where we have to go for them. We’re thinking about the Premier League and nothing else. After the match against Sunderland, we have Anderlecht. The quarter-finals of the Europa League are very important for us."

Mourinho has hinted Zlatan Ibrahimovic may play against the Toffees on Tuesday night after completing his suspension but he admits there is no guarantee the United striker would have broken the duck against the Baggies.

"We had matches here with Zlatan where we drew," recalled the manager. "He missed a penalty in the game against Bournemouth and missed chances like other people did too.

"I cannot say now that if Zlatan and Juan Mata had played on Saturday, we would have won the game. I cannot say that at all. What I can say is Jones and Smalling wouldn’t play better than Bailly and Rojo did and Pogba and Herrera couldn’t play better than what Fellaini and Carrick did."

Paul Pogba was among a group of United players training on the Old Trafford pitch following the West Brom match but Mourinho could not confirm if the Frenchman would face Everton.

"I don’t know about Pogba," he said. "I think Mata is out for a long time, Jones and Smalling for a long time, but I cannot say on Pogba. I cannot say he is ready for Tuesday because I don’t know. I don’t think he is such a long-term injury like the others."

但反還反，唔駛讚番耶子同敢帥掛

應該唔係讚返
只係比較下邊個柒d
佢愛將普巴係隊波抵潮期可以點幫到球隊
咪剩係改變髮型囉，有撚經驗帶領隊友咩
隊員有信心危機 爆炸首當其衝啦，唔通諗為佢可以幫隊友減壓咩



椰子接個隊係上年冠軍 關咩錢事
敢帥成績好好多咩? 啲波睇到一場訓著3次
daddy用錢多 但都睇到佢執個幾條友黎係真係有用
上場無廢老無普巴 成隊波盲頭烏蠅咁 啲波唔知做比邊個好 買到拜利返黎更加係屌打全隊中堅啦
其他球員根本就係唔夠班同比上兩手玩壞晒 都要比時間daddy去執架 黎半年拎到隻飛機杯先都算交代到啦 曼城車仔都唔係一洗錢就拎到成績啦


得罪講句 干地同哥狗接個隊都係冠軍陣容
人地隊波呢2-3年都冇咩大變動
但我地隊波攞過英超嘅人有邊個

咪就係歐霸32強次回合贏緊3粒都仲出全力
跟住傷撚左mk開始
依家你走去怪mk打唔起？邊個咁on9搞到佢傷呀
怪球隊出現信心危機 球員無態
不如諗下你自己做過乜決定啦摩佬
全部野都係你搞出黎

邊關事...之前隊波咪又係柒
今季有幾多場波係嬴得清脆利落

場場都贏唔到 又入唔到波就梗係有信心危機
仲有成隊波有邊個拎過世界杯冠軍 邊個最有經驗 有個小豬係度你就冷落人雪9人
呢d世界級球員就係可以幫到你
講傳中小豬分分鍾屌打晒你全隊咁多個
用人剩係比無限機會你d愛將
真係
